ithimr 0.1
  • Reference

Assign age groups to individuals

assign_age_groups.Rd

Prunes dataset given max and min ages; assigns age group labels given age

assign_age_groups(dataset, age_category = AGE_CATEGORY,
  age_lower_bounds = AGE_LOWER_BOUNDS, max_age = MAX_AGE,
  min_age = AGE_LOWER_BOUNDS[1], age_label = "age")

Arguments

dataset

data frame to be edited
age_category

vector of strings giving age categories
age_lower_bounds

lower boundaries of age categories
max_age

maximum age for model
min_age

minimum age for model
age_label

string label for age column

Value

edited data frame

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
